DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety tubularized incised plate urethroplasty versus foreskin graft tubularized incised plate urethroplasty primary hypospadias . This study include patient width urethral plate ≤ 7 mm , width glans ≤ 14 mm , urethral plate depth shallow moderate .
DOC.brief_title: Foreskin Graft Tubularized Incised Plate Urethroplasty v Tubularized Incised Plate Primary Hypospadias ( FGTIP-TIP )

The main aim determine efficacy ( functional cosmetic ) safety ( complication ) TIP vs FG-TIP . The study design randomize clinical trial , double blind ( patient evaluator ) , parallel group . The sample size calculate compare two proportion , alpha 0.05 , beta 0.2 ; 34 patient per group . The main outcome complication .
